summary: A class that models a deprecated single‑qubit gate performing a rotation about the combined X+Z axis, mathematically equivalent to a U(π/2, φ, λ) operation and represented by a specific 2×2 unitary matrix.
business_intent: Enable construction of legacy quantum circuits that use the U2 gate while guiding users toward the newer U‑gate implementation, ensuring compatibility with IBM Quantum hardware and providing utilities such as definition and inversion of the gate.
